# Before submitting PR

Add required semver label _(one of)_:

- `patch`, `minor`, `major`
- or `release`

Add PR category label:

- for Features ğŸš€
  - `feature`
  - `enhancement`
- for Bug Fixes ğŸ›
  - `fix`
- Maintenance ğŸ§°
  - `chore`
  - `wording`

Or use special `skip-changelog` label if you want to exclude this PR from being presented in release changelog.
